name: bombot
description: Bombot is a JavaScript-based rewrite of [@18maherc](https://github.com/18maherc)'s [Discord-Bot](https://github.com/18maherc/Discord-Bot) project. It re-implements all features of the prior as well as adds new ones, and all runs on a Docker container hosted by [@AndrewJones-PSU](https://github.com/AndrewJones-PSU).

scripts.test: nodemon --exec npm run dev --watch src --ext ts
